tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE telepsychiatry_ehr_integration (
  patient_id INT,
  patient_name VARCHAR,
  appointment_date DATE,
  psychiatrist_name VARCHAR,
  diagnosis TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE telepsychiatry_patient (patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50), age INT, diagnosis VARCHAR(100));
CREATE TABLE electronic_health_record (ehr_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, record_date DATE, medical_history TEXT, prescription VARCHAR(200));
CREATE TABLE treatment_plan (plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, plan_date DATE, goals TEXT, interventions TEXT);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  birth_date DATE,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15),
  email VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE TelepsychiatryAppointments (
  appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  appointment_date TIMESTAMP,
  provider_id INT,
  notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE HealthRecords (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  record_date TIMESTAMP,
  diagnosis TEXT,
  prescription TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Providers (
  provider_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  specialty VARCHAR(50),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15),
  email VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE electronic_health_record (
	ehr_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	patient_id INT,
	date_of_visit DATE,
	symptoms TEXT,
	diagnosis TEXT
);
